title: Stylised brush script on “White Reindeer” movie poster
content:
Hey all, does anyone have any idea what the script is on the “White Reindeer” movie poster? Repeating characters are identical so it is definitely a font.  
 [http://impawards.com/2013/white\_reindeer\_ver2.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803050303/http:/impawards.com/2013/white_reindeer_ver2.html "http://impawards.com/2013/white\_reindeer\_ver2.html")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803050303im_/http:/typophile.com/files/White-Reindeer_typo_5209.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: The lowercase seems to be **Imitation** by Harold Lohner
As usual, great find, Fivos! Imitation latest version [Imitation Three](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803050303/http:/haroldsfonts.com/groups/i) embeds uppercases.
